data.title: Eras, Order, Facts, Series, & More
data.meta_description: Learn more about the classics of the Godzilla film series and discover new details about the best Godzilla movies, we have it all.

1954

Godzilla

1954

Godzilla rises from the Pacific to attack Tokyo in the definitive cinematic allegory for humankind’s disregard for nature and itself.

Directed By

Ishiro Honda

Music By

Story By

Takeo Murata & Ishiro Honda

Story By

1998

Godzilla

Music By

David Arnold

Story By

Dean Devlin & Roland Emmerich

2014

Godzilla

2014

An American soldier and his father are pulled into an escalating crisis as Godzilla emerges from the sea to combat new monsters that threaten humanity.

Directed By

Gareth Edwards

Music By

Alexandre Desplat

Story By

David Callaham

2019

Godzilla: King of the Monsters

2019

The crypto-zoological agency Monarch fights to survive a battery of monsters as Godzilla battles Mothra, Rodan, and King Ghidorah.

Directed By

Michael Dougherty

Music By

Bear McCreary

Story By

Max Borenstein, Michael Dougherty, & Zach Shields

2021

Godzilla vs. Kong

2021

Directed By

Adam Wingard

Music By

Junkie XL

Story By

Eric Pearson & Max Borenstein

2024

Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire

2024

Directed By

Adam Wingard

Music By

Tom Holkenborg and Antonio Di Iorio

Story By

Terry Rossio, Simon Barrett & Jeremy Slater

ANIME ANIME

2017

GODZILLA: Planet of the Monsters

2017

20,000 years after humanity flees Earth to escape Godzilla-imposed extinction, a group of space-faring human refugees attempt to take back their home planet.

Directed By

Kobun Shizuno & Hiroyuki Seshita

Music By

Takayuki Hattori

Story By

Gen Urobuchi

2018

GODZILLA: A City on the Edge of Battle

2018

With the help of a new Mechagodzilla, a group of human refugees continue their fight to reclaim Earth from Godzilla in this sequel to Planet of the Monsters.

Directed By

Kobun Shizuno & Hiroyuki Seshita

Music By

Takayuki Hattori

Story By
